title: Flame people.
body:
If you ever want to flame someone, but they leave chat before you can do because they're a wuss, comment down below. Just get it out of your system instead of letting it ruin your day.
Have a great one

P.S is this allowed?

replies.body: So long as you don't name names or go overboard, you're pretty safe to vent here on boards, that said, anything like hate speech is a no go. Worth mentioning however that flaming in post game can in fact get you banned so I wouldn't recommend it.
